text: L'Opinion is a French language daily newspaper based in Paris, France. ==History and profile== L'Opinion was first published on 15 May 2013. The founder of the paper is Nicolas Beytout who served as the editor of Le Figaro and Les Échos. L'Opinion was modelled on the Italian daily Il Foglio and American politics publication Politico. L'Opinion, is published by Bey Medias Presse and Internet. L'Opinion is headquartered in Paris and is published in Berlin format. The paper defines itself as a liberal, pro-business, and pro- European publication. Luc de Barochez is the editor-in-chief of the online version of the paper which is behind a paywall. ==See also== * List of newspapers in France ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:2013 establishments in France Category:Daily newspapers published in France Category:Newspapers published in Paris Category:Publications established in 2013
title: L'Opinion (French newspaper)
